title: Kayn-o'-lantern :)  (Pumpkin carving)
body:
It took some time to figure out how to make it, but I just had to do it !!! I really like how it turned out :)

https://imgur.com/XPyyfKa

here it is unlit (looks kinda strange tho)

https://imgur.com/tFkB0yr

replies.body: You misspelled Pumpkayn.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oO9MA45V,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-10-29T02:41:14.130+0000)
>
> You misspelled Pumpkayn.

omfg xD why didn't I think of that earlier !!

Sometimes ya just KAYNT think
;)
Woah! This is so cool, it turned out amazing! Thanks for sharing! <3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Hylia,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oO9MA45V,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-10-30T02:30:43.261+0000)
>
> Woah! This is so cool, it turned out amazing! Thanks for sharing! <3

You know what else is amazing? Your Risen lissandra concept that you posted years ago and everyone loved? You need to make that skin happen! I made another post as a reminder months ago and people loved it

My queens {{champion:421}} {{champion:127}} need more skins!
At least Lissandra has: 
- More than 2
- One from recently (at least as recent as Camille's release) 

Rek'Sai uhhh....?
anything with low play rates may have a long wait time before a skin is released, you're probably looking at a hextech exclusive for rek'sai

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Hylia,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oO9MA45V,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-10-30T02:30:43.261+0000)
>
> Woah! This is so cool, it turned out amazing! Thanks for sharing! <3

it is my pleasure :D <3
Looks awesome, where can I order one?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
that's so damn nice! {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
Pumpkins were harmed during the making of these pictures, how do you plead?
Oh hey, I saw this on your Instagram story, looks good. :D Your cosplay work is good too btw.
I just heard the Kayn voice actor call me a “bumpkin” in my head zzzz
remember a while back when they had a pumpkin carving contest? wonder why that isn't around anymore? XD
Lit looks like Kayn from the front (I take it that was the intention lol), and unlit looks like Kayn from the back XD. That's funny lol
At first I didn't think it was real, wow, great job!
Ooo that's pretty neat :D
Thats cool man. GOOD JOB
Creativity at its finest.
goddamn, that's good. nice job.
